tool.name: SAGA.shapes_polygons.11
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayCLIP False isArrayS_INPUT False isArrayM_INPUT True output_data_S_OUTPUT $output_data_S_OUTPUT output_data_M_OUTPUT $output_data_M_OUTPUT name SAGA.shapes_polygons.11 CLIP $CLIP S_INPUT $S_INPUT M_INPUT $M_INPUT DISSOLVE $DISSOLVE MULTIPLE $MULTIPLE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_S_OUTPUT $OutputSection_S_OUTPUT.outputType_S_OUTPUT transmissionMode_S_OUTPUT $OutputSection_S_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_S_OUTPUT outputType_M_OUTPUT $OutputSection_M_OUTPUT.outputType_M_OUTPUT transmissionMode_M_OUTPUT $OutputSection_M_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_M_OUTPUT

param.name: CLIP
param.label: Clip Features
param.help: Clip Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: S_INPUT
param.label: Input Features
param.help: Input Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: M_INPUT
param.label: Input Features
param.help: Input Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_S_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_S_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_M_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_M_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Clipping of vector layers with a polygon layer.<br/>Uses the free and open source software library <b>Clipper</b> created by Angus Johnson.<br/><a target="_blank" href="http://www.angusj.com/delphi/clipper.php">Clipper Homepage</a><br/><a target="_blank" href="http://sourceforge.net/projects/polyclipping/">Clipper at SourceForge</a><br/>
